item.title: The economy’s at risk of plunging into an air pocket, says JPMorgan. What that would mean for stocks now and in the future.
item.description: Investors are brushing aside the possibilities of more turbulence to come for the U.S. economy and potential fallout for markets, warns JPMorgan.

item.title: ‘Shocked’ reaction to White House Zelensky meeting sends Europe defense stocks soaring
item.description: JPMorgan lifts price targets of European defense companies by an average of 25% after furious reaction in European capitals to Trump-Zelensky meeting.

item.title: A dear friend, 91, wants to add me to the deed of his house. His daughter died and he’s not close to his son. Is that a good idea?
item.description: “What is the best way to add my name, so there are no issues upon his death?”

item.title: ‘I have yelled, screamed and cried’: My mother gave $400K to scammers over Facebook. She still gives them Apple gift cards. What can I do?
item.description: “I have been living a nightmare with my mother for seven years.”

item.title: These are the posh mansions that new FBI deputy director Dan Bongino owns
item.description: Bangino currently holds the keys to at least one multi-million property in Florida, plus a home in Maryland.
